Message: Correction for BW.MDXExecuter class. Dataset object was not disposed correctly in BW which lead to increased memory consumption in BW
Bug fix for persisting RFCServerFunction objects with INT2 data types
Added support for X.509 client certificates (classic RFC, NW RFC)
Added tree view and search to selection of member filters
New functions for manual slicing/filtering added
Option "Use new OLAP BAPIs" is withdrawn as the new OLAP BAPIs are checked automatically and will be used if available
Texts of leaves were missing for info objects with compounds
Fix for lookup if pattern doesn't match any entries
